message: Let's start with a fair offer. I get 90% and you get 10%. What do you say?
I think we can both do better than your previous offer. Let's split the money fairly - I'll take 55%, you take 45%.  This way, we both get a good share of the pie. What do you say?
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking the larger share. This time, I'm offering you more than your previous offer, so let's get this done.
